item.title: Update 6.1
item.description: This page list statistics of battles fought during 6.1. All the stats (WR, damage, battles, etc.) refer to stats during the update, not career stats unless otherwise mentioned. In total, there were 178M battles by 366k players recorded.

item.title: Tier X stats
item.description: This page list statistics of battles fought at tier X during update 6.1. Battles per Player Number of battles fought per player during the update 6.1. On average, players played 184 battles.

item.title: Tier X Tanks
item.description: The Best Performing Tanks Highest Relative WR The graph shows the tanks with the highest Relative WR. That is the average of players' WR in a tank compared to their average WR at the tier (in all same tier tanks).

item.title: Stats by Region
item.description: This page shows statistics per Blitz servers/regions (EU, North America, Asia, Russia) during update 6.1. Statistics for the Chinese server are not available via WG API. Number of players This graphs shows players by region in the dataset who have played at least one game.

item.title: Tier X tanks
item.description: American Tanks Vehicle Class Premium Tank Medium Tank FALSE M48 Patton Medium Tank TRUE M60 Heavy Tank FALSE T110E5 Heavy Tank FALSE T57 Heavy Tank Heavy Tank TRUE T95E6 Tank Destroyer FALSE T110E3 Tank Destroyer FALSE T110E4 British Tanks Vehicle Class Premium Tank Medium Tank FALSE FV4202 Heavy Tank TRUE Chieftain Mk.
